name: Pablo Sierra
aboutMe: As an experienced Information Technology Engineer and Data Scientist, I've had the privilege of working with various technologies, including Oracle Cloud Infrastructure, Analytics, Machine Learning, and more. With over 6 years of experience in the field at 2024, I've developed a strong foundation in data science and machine learning, allowing me to drive successful implementations and knowledge sharing initiatives across stakeholders. My expertise spans designing and deploying AI and analytics solutions using Oracle Cloud technologies, as well as hands-on experience in data science and machine learning projects. I'm confident in my ability to extract value from data for Latin American customers, leveraging cloud and hybrid solutions for lake house, data science, and machine learning projects. As a seasoned professional, I've honed my skills in areas like data governance guidance, proof of concept planning, and internal activities such as developing tools for sales directors and teams. My passion for knowledge sharing has led me to publish technical documentation, provide insights to product managers, and participate in workshops and webinars. Throughout my career, I've had the privilege of working with eterprise organizations. With a Bachelor's degree in Electrical and Electronic Engineering and certifications like Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Foundations and Oracle Autonomous Database Cloud, I'm well-equipped to tackle complex data model workloads and address big data challenges. Feel free to connect with me on LinkedIn and learn more about my journey as an IT professional!
